Class KNet

com.kneelawk.knet.api.KNet

KNet xplat public interface.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final PlayChannelContext<BlockEntity>
    BLOCK_ENTITY_CONTEXT
    Channel context used for associating a channel with a block entity so that messages can be sent between client and server instances of that block entity.
    static final PlayChannelContext<Entity>
    ENTITY_CONTEXT
    Channel context used for associating a channel with an entity so that messages can be sent between client and server instances of that entity.
    static final PlayChannelContext<ScreenHandler>
    SCREEN_HANDLER_CONTEXT
    Channel context used for associating a channel with a screen handler so that messages can be sent between client and server instances of that screen handler.

  • Field Details

    • BLOCK_ENTITY_CONTEXT

      public static final PlayChannelContext<BlockEntity> BLOCK_ENTITY_CONTEXT
      Channel context used for associating a channel with a block entity so that messages can be sent between client and server instances of that block entity.

      In order to use this in your own channel, use: 

      
 new ContextualChannel<>(channelId, KNet.BLOCK_ENTITY_CONTEXT.cast(MyBlockEntity.class), myPayloadCodec);

    • ENTITY_CONTEXT

      public static final PlayChannelContext<Entity> ENTITY_CONTEXT
      Channel context used for associating a channel with an entity so that messages can be sent between client and server instances of that entity.

      In order to use this in your own channel, use: 

      
 new ContextualChannel<>(channelId, KNet.ENTITY_CONTEXT.cast(MyEntity.class), myPayloadCodec);

    • SCREEN_HANDLER_CONTEXT

      public static final PlayChannelContext<ScreenHandler> SCREEN_HANDLER_CONTEXT
      Channel context used for associating a channel with a screen handler so that messages can be sent between client and server instances of that screen handler.

      In order to use this in your own channel, use: 

      
 new ContextualChannel<>(channelId, KNet.SCREEN_HANDLER_CONTEXT.cast(MyScreenHandler.class), myPayloadCodec);
